LanguageData.NY_MealChickenwithMushroom.label: chicken mushroom bouillon
LanguageData.NY_MealChickenwithMushroom.description: Traditionally a soup of chicken and shiitake mushroom, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, the meat and mushroom used varies.
LanguageData.NY_MealDumpling.label: loong dumplings
LanguageData.NY_MealDumpling.description: Meat and vegetable wrapped in dumpling skin and boiled. Paired with vinegar or chili oil dip sauce. A famous loong cook declared it takes meat and vegetable to make best dumplings, so vegetarian and meat only dumplings dropped out of favor.
LanguageData.NY_MealFishFlavoured.label: fishy flavored meat strips
LanguageData.NY_MealFishFlavoured.description: Thin tender strips of meat, coupled with wood ear and bamboo shots. Stir-fried with prickled chili peppers, spring onions, gingers and garlics, resulting a dish with rich flavors akin to fish.\n\nThe recipe is a union classified secret.
LanguageData.NY_MealGreenPepper.label: green pepper meat fry
LanguageData.NY_MealGreenPepper.description: Stir-fried green pepper and meat, goes well with a bowl of rice.\n\nThe recipe is a union classified secret.
LanguageData.NY_MealLavish_Meat.label: braised meat chunks
LanguageData.NY_MealLavish_Meat.description: A chunk of (hopefully normal) meat braised in spices. Fat was reduced from lard resulting a soft but not overwhelmingly oily taste.
LanguageData.NY_MealLavish_Veg.label: vegetable stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_MealLavish_Veg.description: A simple dish made of stir-fried vegetale. Vibrant in color and crispy in texture. Traditionally made from leaf vegetables, though due to ingredient availability in rimworld, stir-fried potatos or even strawberries are not something unheard of.
LanguageData.NY_MealLeekwithEgg.label: chives egg stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_MealLeekwithEgg.description: Short strips of chives blended into whipped egg, then poured into a hot wok and rapidly stir-fried.\n\nThe recipe is a union classified secret.
LanguageData.NY_MealLotusRootSlices.label: lotus root salad
LanguageData.NY_MealLotusRootSlices.description: A salad made from parboiled lotus root slices, and various condiments. A byproduct of lotus fiber industry. Some prefered it sweet, others prefered it spicy.\n\nIt was said to contain a small curse that holes in the lotus roots are turned into consumer's pores for a short duration. A joke of archotech maybe?
LanguageData.NY_MealMapoTofu.label: mapo tofu
LanguageData.NY_MealMapoTofu.description: Tofu braised in broad-bean sauce and mince. It has a tender texture which can be broken down with tongues.\n\nThe recipe is a union classified secret.
LanguageData.NY_MealRandomShreds.label: potato ginger strip stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_MealRandomShreds.description: Potato and ginger cut into similar sized strips and then stir-fried. One cannot tell the ginger strips apart from potato. This dish is usually used for pranks, though some believe it reveals a glimpse of fate.
